title: DBSCAN
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
Clustering based on density. 
Can find arbitrary shapes (moons, circles) where K-Means fails. 
Identifies Outliers as Noise (points in low density regions).

interview_questions.question: DBSCAN vs K-Means?
interview_questions.answer: DBSCAN handles noise and weird shapes. K-Means forces every point into a spherical cluster.
